meanings.sent1: The puppy became even whizzier after his nap.
meanings.sent2: She felt whizzier after drinking a glass of orange juice.
meanings.sent3: The playground was filled with whizzier children running around happily.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as whizzier as a bubbling brook.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons made the party atmosphere even whizzier.

meanings.definition: To move quickly or with a humming sound
meanings.sent1: The cars whizziered past us on the highway.
meanings.sent2: I heard the bicycle whizzier by my window.
meanings.sent3: The bees whizziered around the garden collecting nectar.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to whizzier by as we enjoyed ourselves at the park.
meanings.sent5: The rocket whizziered into the sky, leaving a trail of smoke behind.
